data.text: @yoyoty86 @blakeshelton Go look in the mirror and then you will see what judgemental is.
@shibbard3 @blakeshelton I have a clue. You & Blake
@yoyoty86 @blakeshelton You need to go look up the definition of racist. Cuz you don't have a clue.

@shibbard3 @blakeshelton “I would’ve turned my chair for you but  you have so much “soul” in your voice I know you wouldn’t pick me” - A racist gatekeeper of country music. And miss me with the “he picks black artists” shit. How many of them are successful in country music? Racist ass pigs.
@shibbard3 @blakeshelton I bet your parents are country ass racists as well. And certainly your grandparents were.
@yoyoty86 @blakeshelton You are prejudice, simple and small minded. Understand?
@shibbard3 @blakeshelton I’ve said exactly what I had to say. He’s prejudice, simple, small minded and his theories for picking talent are racist. Understand?
@yoyoty86 @blakeshelton No i don't need to. You need to quit throwing the word racist around. And nice language. That is the language that people resort to when they have nothing logical to say.
@shibbard3 @blakeshelton You need to. I’ve already said what I think of anyone who thinks the way he chooses artists on that show is normal or acceptable. Fuck off
@yoyoty86 @blakeshelton No i won't shut up. Why don't you.

@yoyoty86 @shibbard3 @blakeshelton Blake seems to be going with artists that are closer to his own musical lane this season.  It's not a racial thing.  His first love is country music, so he will always lean more towards those artists.  With the exception of Kirk, all the rest of the country artists are white.
@shibbard3 @blakeshelton Jennifer makes attempts at artists of ALL genres. Black does not always. Shut the hell up already.

@yoyoty86 @blakeshelton I think you meant the very least. And  it is no different then Jennifer thinking all country artists will pick Blake. You are looking for something that isn't there. Quit trying to start crap.
@shibbard3 @blakeshelton It’s prejudice and small minded at very best. Justifying the stupidity makes you the same.
@yoyoty86 @blakeshelton You need to learn what racist means. Thinking that someone who isn't country is going to pick Jennifer is not racist.
